title: BayesianGroupAna.py
description: This program conducts Bayesian Group Analysis (BGA) on a list of regions of interest (ROIs). Compared to the conventional univariate GLM, BGA pools and shares the information across the ROIs in a multilevel system.

dataTable.title: Data Table
dataTable.description: Input text file containing the data table.

y_variable.title: Y Variable
y_variable.description: Column name for the y variable.

x_variables.title: X Variables
x_variables.description: Column name(s) for the x variables. If not specified, only the intercept will be added.

no_center.title: No Center
no_center.description: Disable centering on the x variables. Maybe useful if you centered manually.

iterations.title: Iterations
iterations.description: Number of total iterations per chain including warmup. Default [1000]

control_list.title: Control List
control_list.description: Comma separated list of control parameters to pass to the brm function. Default is the brm function defaults.

plot.title: Plot
plot.description: Output box, fit, and posterior prediction plots.

more_plots.title: More Plots
more_plots.description: Output 'stanplots' given different types of plot names.

RData.title: RData
RData.description: Save the R session workspace and data.

seed.title: Seed
seed.description: Seed to generate random number. Default [1234]
